Loading Libaries and Data
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
house <- read_csv("housing.txt")
names(house) <- tolower(names(house))
```


Using K nearest neighbors algorithm for imputation 
$k = \frac{\sqrt{N}}{2}$ where N is the number of samples in `train`.
```{r}
sapply(house, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

house <- house[,sapply(house, function(x) sum(is.na(x))) < nrow(house)/2]

#install.packages('VIM')
library(VIM)

k = round(sqrt(1460*.8) / 2)

house <- kNN(house, k = k)
house <- house[,1:77]

sapply(test, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
```

Split into Training and Testing (80-20)
```{r}
set.seed(888)
index <- sample(nrow(house), nrow(house) * .80)
train <- house[index,]
test <- house[-index,]
```
